content:
/>
XIII.i.5
.A.3.d
.
Action to Take When the Veteran Returns a Completed Application for VR&E Services
When a Veteran returns a completed
VA Form 28-1900
, refer the application to the VR&E activity in accordance with M28C.
If necessary, the VR&E activity will refer the case to the rating activity for a rating decision.
References
:  For more information on
memorandum VR&E ratings, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 5.B
and
M28C, Part IV, A.2
, and
VR&E Service functions, see
VR&E’s intranet site
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
